events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your site but I want to return it because it doesn't fit well and looks different than in the pictures.
The customer's issue is classified under refund due to their request to return the item and get their money back.
Assigning this refund case to refund specialist agent Alex for further assistance and processing.
Hello! I’m Alex from customer support, I understand you want to return your jacket. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original packaging for the return?
The order number is 452798. Yes, the jacket is still in its original packaging and hasn’t been worn or washed.
Thanks for the details! I have initiated the return request. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label I’m emailing you now.
I received the return label, thank you. I will send the jacket back today and hope to get my refund soon.
We have processed your refund as the returned item was received and inspected. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory with your return experience.
Since you have not raised any further concerns, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
